snippet: Two new studies indicate that climate change will produce increasingly severe storms in the western United States. But it will be many years before scientists can definitively link the severity of those events to human-driven global warming.
abstract: Two new studies indicate that climate change will produce increasingly severe storms in the western United States. But it will be many years before scientists can definitively link the severity of those events to human-driven global warming.

headline.main: When It Rains, It Will Really Pour
